About using the coverage job instead of the usual job, I see a couple of problems:

 * Time increase done by the different coverage overheads: now is about ~20min per run
 * Not so probable, but the coverage could add some code that makes the usual testing run to fail.

About enabling code_check on different platforms: the main idea is to enable it only in our CI on pull request jobs (trusty gpu nvidia) so we are not running the same checks over and over in different platforms. You are probably looking for using the latest version of cppcheck, we can use the backport PPA to run it on trusty. I see no reason to run them on homebrew or coverage.
